description:
✂  Tools & Supplies I Recommend: https://goo.gl/Y7KKhY
$  Join the "Fellowship" on Patreon: https://goo.gl/ZZ4vBf


➳  http://www.blackmagiccraft.ca

➳ Join the Tabletop Crafters Guild: https://goo.gl/RMMqoh


In this episode I do another speed build, and make up a set of miniature tavern tables as part of my big Patreon Thank You giveaway. In the next episodes I will be completing the set with a modular bar and some bookcases.















Background music:
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
title: Miniature Tavern Tables For D&D Tutorial (Black Magic Craft Episode 064)
